name: The Ballad of Banjo
description:
The Ballad of Banjo is a short metroidvania made in 24 hours (we started late) that focuses on your platforming abilities. The main two mechanics are dashing through enemies and jumping. The longer you stay in the air, the more damage you deal. Dashing resets your jump and jumping resets your dash.

Controls Gamepad

Dpad - Move

A - Jump

B or X - Dash

Y - Interact

Rb - Create Checkpoint

Select/Option - Reset to first checkpoint

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

D - Dash

E - Interact

S - Create Checkpoint 

R - Reset to first checkpoint
